org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec

Class DefaultTableDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec.WithNameSpecification<T>

          • org.springdata.cassandra.cql.spec.DefaultTableDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableDescriptor

    public class DefaultTableDescriptor
extends TableSpecification<DefaultTableDescriptor>
    Convenient default implementation of TableDescriptor as an extension of TableSpecification that doesn't require the use of generics.
    Author:
    Matthew T. Adams
